title: Need a
content:
i asap need a font like the montreal expos or LA dodgers baseball team logos...   
thanks j55 ![dodgers logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12629.gif)

 [‹ Hebrew font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/typophile.com/node/510 "Go to previous forum topic") [LPF soccer font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/typophile.com/node/26802 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j55

comments.content:
I know that [Nick's Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.nicksfonts.com/) has [Team Spirit](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.nicksfonts.com/fonts/t.html), a freeware font   
with a swoosh, but the script itself is quite different.   
Furthermore, [Letterheadfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/) also carry this kind of   
 [enhanced scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/styles/script.shtml).

And then there's [Thirstype](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.thirstype.com/)'s [Radio](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.thirstype.com/font_radio.html) by [Magnus Rakeng](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.thirstype.com/bydesigner_rakeng.html)  
of course. No swoosh though, but you can always add   
that yourself.

you can also try monotype script   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/monotype-script/script-mt-bold/testdrive.html?s=Dodgers&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009144026/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/monotype-script/script-mt-bold/testdrive.html?s=Dodgers&p=48)
